channel.title: Cooperativity on RD's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Cooperativity on RD's Blog

item.title: Structures and Metal-ion Binding Properties of the Ca2+-Binding Helix–Loop–Helix EF-hand Motifs
item.description: Notes on 2007 Biochemical Journal review discussing EF-hand structural diversity, Ca²⁺/Mg²⁺ binding properties, cooperativity, and conformational changes. Focus on EF-hand pairing, metal selectivity, and functional adaptation for signaling.
